channel.title: Irc
channel.description:
I know throughout the years we've tried multiple times to get users to join IRC to have intelligent discussions/just have a place to hang out and talk together. This topic isn't so much about persuading you to join IRC, it's more about finding out what reasons you have for not joining.
I know from personal experience upon joining IRC most of the time you're instantly trolled, I can definitely agree that this is the [b]wrong answer[/b], I understand that would throw off members off from wanting to spend time there. I mean after all, who wants to be somewhere they don't feel wanted? My question for you is what can [b]WE[/b] the channel operators do to make it a better place to come and hang out? I was thinking about drafting out new channel rules based on the input from the community in hopes of possibly getting some more traffic. Again, I'm [b]NOT[/b] trying to persuade you to join, I'd just like to know why you don't want to join.
Any input/questions is highly desired!

item.title: Irc
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“Evil_, post:24, topic:538047”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=656873.msg4394915#msg4394915 date=1388818987]
i honestly don’t know how to use it

i tried going on a few times but I didn’t know what I was doing haha I didn’t see anyone talking so I got confused and left
[/quote]Yea, that’s the main reason I’m wanting to see why people don’t join. From time to time you’ll see someone join and they’ll say “Hi” and literally wait like 2-3 seconds and leave, the simple fact is sometimes we’re just not looking at IRC lol it doesn’t hurt anything to just leave IRC open and idle there. That’s actually what most of us to do anyway, once someone says your name your client will usually start flashing so you know someone’s speaking to you[/quote]
yeah I downloaded mirc yesterday so It’s a lot easier to do that, thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Irc
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:23, topic:538047”]i honestly don’t know how to use it

i tried going on a few times but I didn’t know what I was doing haha I didn’t see anyone talking so I got confused and left[/quote]Yea, that’s the main reason I’m wanting to see why people don’t join. From time to time you’ll see someone join and they’ll say “Hi” and literally wait like 2-3 seconds and leave, the simple fact is sometimes we’re just not looking at IRC lol it doesn’t hurt anything to just leave IRC open and idle there. That’s actually what most of us to do anyway, once someone says your name your client will usually start flashing so you know someone’s speaking to you

Read full topic
